ValidationRule.description: Requires approval of Claim amount before closing.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Claim_Amount_Approved__c = FALSE, Credit_Amount__c > 2000, ISPICKVAL( Financial_Disposition__c , "Financial Invoice"), OR( ISPICKVAL (Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL (Status, "Closed - Approved") ), OR( RecordType.Name = "Quality Claim", AND ( RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", ISPICKVAL( Type, "Freight Claim") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This record must be approved before closing. Please submit this record for approval on the previous page in the Approval list
